field.name: What to do while waiting for transport to arrive:
Advise mother/caregiver not to carry the child on her back
Teach mother/caregiver how to keep the child warm on the way to the health facility
If child still breastfeeds, observe mother breastfeeding and provide counseling on breast attachment and positioning, if necessary
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding a sick child
Accompany mother and child to the health facility
Follow up with client after discharge from health center or hospitalv
